page.title: 06Church in Horncliffe
page.content: The church seats 334 people,the entire population of the village,but there being only 63 members,it is only filled on two or three occasions annually.There have been 15 ministers since the chuch was founded. In 1876 the Presbyterian Church in England united with the English congregations of United Presbyterian Church to become the Presbyterian Church of Eng_ land.In 1972 a further union with the Congregational Church of England and Wales brought into being the United Reform Church.Links first formed with Norham about 100 years before were strengthened when in the early 1970s the two congregations were united under one minister living in Horn_ cliffe.Without a minister thge church is still active with Sunday Worship and School,womens' meeting and provides for a play group etc.
